profile:
1-800-Rid-Of-It is Toronto's premier junk removal service. We are a locally-owned company providing quality service to homeowners and commercial clients in Toronto and the surrounding areas since 2007. We specialize in the removal of junk from homes, construction sites, garages, warehouses, office towers, and apartment buildings- basically, anywhere you have JUNK. 

We also offer same day junk pickup and make sure no damage is caused to your property during this process. With our online price estimator, you can find the best rates for junk removal and bin disposal in Toronto.

profile:
What happens when affordable moving, efficient movers, and a satisfied customer are combined? You're left with J And J Moving Services. At J And J Moving, where the customer is king, we take care of the hard work to eliminate the stress of your move. Sit back, relax, and let us take care of you. Fast and efficient, reliable and professional, J And J Moving can take care of any job, any time. From long distance full service moves all the way through to local junk removal, J And J Moving can't be beat. Call now (647-293-1400) for a free quote or use our online quoting service.

profile: Welcome to Gardenzilla Lawn & Garden. We offer lawn, garden and snow services in Midtown Toronto and East York. We offer exceptional gardening services, with easy online booking and simple pricing. Our most popular services are our garden cleanups and landscape staging, to help homeowners and home sellers restore neglected or overgrown gardens. We also do garden maintenance, garden installation and upgrades, and annual and bulb flower planting.

profile:
Big Ben’s offers full-service cleanouts, or you can complete a cleanout or cleanup with the help of your friends or family members (always a great bonding experience). For cleanups, the crew at Big Ben’s Junk Removal can demolish, dismantle, and remove any debris, leaving the area ready for the next project. For estate cleanouts, we can help empty the residence of any unwanted items and make it ready for sale.

At Big Ben’s Junk Removal, we are committed to your complete satisfaction and getting the job done right. Whether it’s junk removal, demolition, estate clearing, or small appliance removal, we’re here to help!

Because of our focus on delivering exceptional service and quality bins, we have retained many long-term customers. Get a free estimate — call Big Ben’s Junk Removal for service in Toronto and the surrounding areas.
services:
Big Ben’s Junk Removal was started by “Big Ben” over 15 years ago with just one pickup truck, later moving on to several trailers. We now offer four trucks and many waste removal bins. We are proud to remain a local, family-owned and operated business with five highly professional employees.

We always emphasize safety and all services are fully insured. Big Ben’s is also very conscious of the environment, because we live on this planet too.
name: Big Ben's Junk Removal

profile:
We offer junk removal services for your home or business. We’re the junk removal company that handles the tough stuff – and we ensure that your junk is recycled, donated, or otherwise disposed of responsibly.
Do you have old furniture, appliances, electronics, tires, construction debris, or yard waste you need to make disappear,  Junk Canada Removal Inc.TM can take away almost any material we can fit in our trucks, without you ever lifting a finger. We’ll remove junk from wherever it’s located, and we won’t leave a dent or speck of dirt behind. When we say we're your full-service junk removal company, we really mean it.

profile:
Junk, clutter or unwanted materials taking up space? Let us do the dirty work for you or you can rent a bin and do the work yourself.

***

Junk Kings junk removal services are offered to residential and commercial customers. We provide all-inclusive services to our clients from loading to transport to disposal of your junk. 

***

Our trucks have 20 cubic yard boxes, which is equivalent to 10 pick-up truck loads. The trucks are operated by a strong, professional and courteous staff that will evaluate the work and quote a price based on weight, volume and time. Upon agreement, the crew will load, haul and dispose of your rubbish at your earliest convenience.

Give us a call today!

Random Junk We Have Removed

Over the years Junk King has removed some very odd and random junk. This is a list of some of the items we have removed.

-Twenty-five boxes of 1940-1960 Life Magazines
-Old rotted camping trailer cut into pieces
-One full truck of expired potato chips
-Five broken slushy machines
-World War 2 Memorabilia
-Four truck loads worth of paper and cardboard from a 1 bedroom apartment
-Twelve sofas from one basement
-Crisp new $1 bills from the 1960’s hidden in an old coat pocket
-Two truck loads full of mannequin heads

profile:
At ACG INC we build homes, not houses! 

Our experts have been providing quality general contractor services to our valuable customers since 2017. We offer 100% satisfaction guarantee on our workmanship and we offer competitive prices with exceptional quality. Regardless of scope, we approach every single home renovation with a foundation of strong design aesthetics, comprehensive product options, sound project management, and a commitment to craftsmanship. We are transparent with your project from start to finish, ensuring that the final product meets your expectations. We will also happily assist you with obtaining permits, choosing design and  architecture. 

Choosing a reputable contractor is the most important decision you will make regarding your renovation, so you can reach out to ACG INC. with upmost confidence.
products: For our clients' convenience, we've implemented progress billing as well as financing on your project.
services: Our projects range from remodelled bathrooms and kitchens, to rear additions, hardwood flooring, basements, second story additions and other extensive renovations.
specialities: Complete home renovations and custom homes
